data.text: @MikScarlet There should be manifestations the same as any glazed door or screen? Building Regs Part M 1500mm and 1650mm above ground level
@MikScarlet uh that should say Tape, sorry.
@MikScarlet Even just a sticker would do
@MikScarlet Stickers reminding people how they can keep others safe from Covid would be appropriate manifestations, I think.
@MikScarlet Appalling. Whoever has made decision needs to consider this one asap.
@MikScarlet I can't see that (what a surprise!)
@MikScarlet Its a sticker, or a line of them like you see on glass doors. Did they put their brains on hold when they did all this?

@MikScarlet The screen shouldn’t even be there, it isn’t evidence based as far as airborne covid is concerned. Restricts air flow, so next person sat there more at risk if someone earlier had covid! Oh disabled access  not considered full stop, Was even a space allocated for a wheelchair?
